00016  #ifndef __vtkEsquiIdListCollection_h
00017  #define __vtkEsquiIdListCollection_h
00018  
00019  #include "vtkCollection.h"
00020  #include "vtkESQuiCommonWin32Header.h"
00021  #include "vtkEsquiIdList.h" // Needed for inline methods
00022  // Coleccion de vtkEsquiIdList
00024  class VTK_ESQUI_COMMON_EXPORT vtkEsquiIdListCollection : public vtkCollection
00025  {
00026  public:
00027    static vtkEsquiIdListCollection *New();
00028    vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkEsquiIdListCollection,vtkCollection);
00029  
00030  // Agnade un nuevo elemento a la lista
00032    void AddItem(vtkEsquiIdList *ds) {
00033      this->vtkCollection::AddItem((vtkObject *)ds);};
00034    
00035  // Devuelve el elemento siguiente
00037    vtkEsquiIdList *GetNextItem() { 
00038      return static_cast<vtkEsquiIdList *>(this->GetNextItemAsObject());};
00039  
00040  // Devuelve el elemento en la posicion i
00042    vtkEsquiIdList *GetItem(int i) { 
00043      return static_cast<vtkEsquiIdList *>(this->GetItemAsObject(i));};
00044    
00045  protected:
00046    vtkEsquiIdListCollection() {};
00047    ~vtkEsquiIdListCollection() {};
00048  
00049  
00050  private:
00051    // hide the standard AddItem from the user and the compiler.
00052    void AddItem(vtkObject *o) { this->vtkCollection::AddItem(o); };
00053  
00054  private:
00055    vtkEsquiIdListCollection(const vtkEsquiIdListCollection&);  // Not implemented.
00056    void operator=(const vtkEsquiIdListCollection&);  // Not implemented.
00057  };
00058

00060 #endif
